name: Troubled Skies (Hare Software)
description:
Troubled Skies

Control an experimental jet fighter that outperforms all its adversaries. Test your reaction time and see how many victories you can score before you have to abandon ship!

Made in two weeks for the Opera GX Mobile Game Jam with GameMaker Studio.

Features:
  • Interesting pixel art
  • Fast minigames that will test your reaction time
  • A full tutorial
  • Fast jets
How to play?

If you do not know where to start, play the tutorial and instructor Haas will explain everything you need to know!

Want more?

Follow me on Twitter for sneak peeks and updates: https://twitter.com/Hare_Software

Note:

No pilots or jets were harmed during the development of this game.
